content: Yes, Park Distillery Restaurant & Bar offers distillery tours for visitors who are interested in learning more about the distilling process and tasting their award-winning spirits. The tours are guided and take approximately 30 minutes to an hour, depending on the group size and the tour type. During the tour, you can see the distillery up close and learn about the process that goes into making their spirits. You also have the opportunity to taste different spirits and learn how to make cocktails using their spirits. It's a great addition to your visit to the restaurant and a great way to learn more about Canadian-made spirits.
